Cooking.comm: Cooks faster than a traditional oven.

cont.entity_a: Essentially a second oven, capable of cooking anything. Turkey came out moist and tender. Cooks faster than expected, requiring adjustments. Does not brown turkey like a traditional oven. Roaster oven does not heat up the kitchen like a stove. Heats up fast and cooks evenly.
cont.entity_b: Cooks everything in half the time. Heats quickly and cools quickly. Unit heats quickly and efficiently.

Size.comm: Great for large gatherings and frees up oven space.

cont.entity_a: Perfect size for a party of 15-20 people and easy to transport. Large and takes up storage space. Bulky and hard to store. Great for making large quantities of food.
cont.entity_b: Not big enough for a turkey, but suitable for smaller meals.

cont.entity_a: Lightweight design allows for easy packing and moving. Less messy, less kitchen heat, and portable. Prone to sticking and has sharp edges. Lid is thin and warps easily. Smokes a lot when the lid is removed. Short cord makes it difficult to use without an extension.
cont.entity_b: Poorly made with finish coming off. Outside gets very hot. Handles and countertops become hot. Lid is thin and could be heavier. Flimsy aluminum construction.

cont.entity_a: Versatile for baking, roasting, and heating frozen foods.
cont.entity_b: Flexible temperature range allows for slow cooking or roasting.

cont.entity_a: Porcelain started to rust and chip after several uses. Durable and has lasted eight years. Rust spots appeared after several uses.
cont.entity_b: Porcelain insert is not as durable as expected. Nonstick coating peeled off and rusted. Nonstick only lasts 5-7 years of heavy use.

cont.entity_a: Controls are simple to use. Easy to clean and store.
cont.entity_b: Porcelain insert is difficult to clean. Easy to clean and transport.

cont.entity_a: Temperature control knob broke and customer service was unresponsive. Temperature runs hotter than stated. Takes longer to reach desired temperature.
cont.entity_b: Temperature control is versatile and more precise than traditional crock pots. Thermostat is not accurate. Accurate temperature control.
Lid has bubbled and paint is peeling. Paint came off the lid after first use.
Chemical smell present during initial uses. Very strong chemical smell/fumes during first few uses.
